  • Method Details

    • createMovingRobot

      public <T extends MovingRobot> void createMovingRobot(Class<T> clazz, int x, int y, int leftBound, int rightBound, int areaIndex)
      It creates and adds to entities an object of type that is MovingRobot or that extends MovingRobot.
      Parameters:
      x - The X platform tile on which the robot will spawn.
      y - The Y platform tile on which the robot will spawn.
      leftBound - The leftmost platform on which the robot will stop
      rightBound - The rightmost platform on which the robot will stop

    • createAgent

      public void createAgent(double x, double y, int areaIndex)
      Function that creates a new agent. Used for every respawn instance.
